definition: pronounced with the tip of the tongue turned back toward the hard palate, articulate a consonant with the tongue curled back against the palate
details:
adjective
- pronounced with the tip of the tongue turned back toward the hard palate
= synonyms: cacuminal
- bent or curved backward
= synonyms: retroflexed
verb
- articulate a consonant with the tongue curled back against the palate
= example: articulate a consonant with the tongue curled back against the palate
- bend or turn backward
= synonyms: replicate
